sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Mail, Send, Users, TrendingUp, Clock, CheckCircle, XCircle, Phone, Calendar, UserCheck, Zap, Target, BarChart3, Activity, Globe, Sparkles, ArrowUpRight, ArrowDownRight, Plus, Eye, Settings, Star, Award, Rocket } from 'lucide-react'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; import { emailService } from '../../services/emailService'; import Card from '../../components/UI/Card'; import Button from '../../components/UI/Button'; import LoadingSpinner from '../../components/UI/LoadingSpinner'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { format } from 'date-fns'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalEmails: 0, sentToday: 0, responseRate: 0, statusBreakdown: {} }); const [recentEmails, setRecentEmails] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { fetchDashboardData(); }, []); const fetchDashboardData = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const response = await emailService.fetchAllEmails(); if (response.code === '1' && response.data) { const emails = response.data; // Calculate stats const today = new Date().toDateString(); const sentToday = emails.filter(email => email.sentAt && new Date(email.sentAt).toDateString() === today ).length; const statusBreakdown = emails.reduce((acc, email) => { const status = email.status || 'EMAIL_SENT'; acc[status] = (acc[status] || 0) + 1; return acc; }, {}); const responseCount = Object.keys(statusBreakdown).reduce((acc, status) => { if (status !== 'EMAIL_SENT') { acc += statusBreakdown[status]; } return acc; }, 0); const responseRate = emails.length > 0 ? Math.round((responseCount / emails.length) * 100) : 0; setStats({ totalEmails: emails.length, sentToday, responseRate, statusBreakdown }); // Get recent emails (last 5) const sortedEmails = emails .sort((a, b) => new Date(b.sentAt) - new Date(a.sentAt)) .slice(0, 5); setRecentEmails(sortedEmails); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching dashboard data:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const getStatusIcon = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'EMAIL_SENT': return ; case 'EMAIL_RECEIVED': return ; case 'CONTACTED_ON_PHONE': return ; case 'Interview_Scheduled': return ; case 'HIRED': return ; case 'REJECTED': return ; default: return ; } }; const getStatusLabel = (status) => { const labels = { 'EMAIL_SENT': 'Email Sent', 'EMAIL_RECEIVED': 'Email Received', 'CONTACTED_ON_PHONE': 'Contacted On Phone', 'Interview_Scheduled': 'Interview Scheduled', 'HIRED': 'Hired', 'REJECTED': 'Rejected' }; return labels[status] || status; }; if (loading) { return (

Loading your dashboard...

); } return (
{/* Hero Welcome Section */}

Welcome back, {user?.name || 'User'}!

Your email campaigns are performing exceptionally well today

Live Dashboard
Global Reach
{/* Enhanced Stats Cards */}
+12%

Total Emails

{stats.totalEmails}

All time campaigns
+8%

Sent Today

{stats.sentToday}

Daily performance
+15%

Response Rate

{stats.responseRate}%

Engagement metrics
+5%

Active Campaigns

{Object.keys(stats.statusBreakdown).length}

Running campaigns
{/* Quick Actions - Moved to Top/Middle - Enhanced */}

Quick Actions

Streamline your email workflow with one-click actions

Lightning Fast
One-Click Actions
{/* Main Content Grid */}
{/* Status Breakdown - Enhanced */}

Campaign Analytics

Real-time email status breakdown

{Object.keys(stats.statusBreakdown).length > 0 ? (
{Object.entries(stats.statusBreakdown).map(([status, count], index) => { const percentage = Math.round((count / stats.totalEmails) * 100); return (
{getStatusIcon(status)} {getStatusLabel(status)}
{percentage}% {count}
); })}
) : (

No Data Yet

Start sending emails to see your analytics

)}
{/* Recent Activity - Enhanced */}

Recent Activity

Latest email updates

{recentEmails.length > 0 ? (
{recentEmails.map((email, index) => (
{getStatusIcon(email.status)}

{email.recipientEmail}

{email.sentAt ? format(new Date(email.sentAt), 'MMM dd, HH:mm') : 'N/A'}

{getStatusLabel(email.status).split(' ')[0]}
))}
) : (

No recent activity

Your recent emails will appear here

)}
{/* Achievement Section - Enhanced */}

Email Champion

You've sent over {stats.totalEmails} emails!

{[...Array(5)].map((_, i) => ( ))}

High Performer

{stats.responseRate}% response rate achieved!

Productivity Master

{stats.sentToday} emails sent today!

Active Today
); }; export default Dashboard;
